english_example_sentence: If you were to die today, who would care for your young children
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты умер сегодня, кто бы заботился о твоих маленьких детях
turkish_example_sentence: Sen bugün ölsen, küçük çocuklarını kim bakacak ve koruyacak
